pageContext.claim: “Governor Jerry Brown announced he will deploy “up to 400 National Guard Troops” to do nothing. The crime rate in California is high enough, and the Federal Government will not be paying for Governor Brown’s charade. We need border security and action, not words!”
pageContext.analysis: President Trump is mischaracterizing what is happening here. Gov. Brown is sending troops who will assist in fighting crimes like gang activity, human trafficking and drug smuggling. They will not, however, participate in deportations, immigration enforcement or building a wall.
